name: The Undefying Curse
description:
You control a mine manager who has to uncover the nature of an uncontrollable curse to avoid higher losses and keep up with the schedule!

This is an infinity game where your goal is to deliver Yog-Sothoth the most amount of Dream Stones possible.

But there are two problems, first, a randomly generated curse that will hunt your miners down, if your mine gets out of Miners you will lose the game. The second thing is that Yog-Sothoth is a greedy good, he will push you through your limits asking more and more Dream Stones. Fail to deliver his stones and he will kill half of your Miners
